polygon.style: fill: #fffcf2; stroke: #fffcf2; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
fill: #fffcf2; stroke: #fffcf2; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #fffcf2; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
